dining, shopping, entertainment destinations, and major freeways.', 'In that regard, we are minutes away from the Galleria Mall featuring over 400 stores and restaurants.', '\xa0 We are also near Memorial Mall, Mid-town, Uptown, and Downtown.', '\xa0 In addition, the biggest park in Houston, Memorial Park, is about a ten-minute drive from our community.', 'This urban park is one of the biggest in the nation and includes an 18-hole golf course, a running course, plus tennis, softball, croquet, and volleyball facilities.', '\xa0 What We Offer – Luxury Living West 18th Lofts offers luxury kitchen island, granite slab countertops, upgraded Whirlpool appliances, spacious walk-in closets, in-unit washer and dryer, and private balconies and patios.', '\xa0 Our floor plans range in size
